text.title: part1_Wikinews interviews Australian Paralympic wheelchair basketballer Shelley Chaplin

p.s: Yeah !
I think people are often quite surprised by wheelchair basketball , what it is when they actually see it .
I think the name " wheelchair " basketball means disability obviously , but when you watch it there 's nothing about disability to it at all .
Just that we use wheelchairs , and that 's it .
It 's just another sport .
People in the press gallery were saying " I 've just got to get out in a chair and ...
Try it ! Yeah !

So how did you get to go to
Illinois
?

After the
Athens Paralympics
...
You won the bronze medal there ?
No , we won silver in Athens ...
Silver in Athens , bronze in Beijing .

Yeah , while I was over there I met one of the
American
girls , and she was about to take up a scholarship there .

And so I ended up meeting the coach , who was in Athens coaching the
Canadian
men 's team .
So I ended up meeting him , and chatting to him about maybe going over there , and then when I got home I followed it up , and they offered me a scholarship , so I took it .
So he 'd already seen me play at the Paralympics , and knew who I was , so it was good .

Which lead to what we ran on the front page of
Wikipedia
.
Oh yeah ! I saw that !
That was great !
That 's why I rang up up and asked for your birth place .

Somebody raised an objection , and said maybe she was born in the
US
.
Nope !
I thought that was pretty spectacular , because there 's not a lot of athletes in any sport that have done that [ been All-American without being American ] .
Cool .
Definitely cool .
How did your team go while you were there ?
While I was there we ...
I was there for five years .
The first three years we were national champions .
For five years from 2004 to 2009 ?
No , I did n't actually go until 2005 .
So I went in August of 2005 .
And I finished up in May of 2010 .
I went to five national championships , and we won three and came runners up in two .
Wow !
Yeah !
We had a good team .
So you said you played for a club here in Melbourne as well ?

Yeah , I play for the
Dandenong Rangers
here .
We 've just won two championships in a row .
So ... hopefully three this year .
Wow !
Yeah !
It 's pretty cool .
That 's a pretty amazing record .
Yeah .

And then of course there 's the
Gliders
as well .
You 've got the gold ... no wait ...
